attributes.action: LEARNERS MUST PASS A THEORY TEST BEFORE THEY CAN APPLY FOR A LICENCE
attributes.additional_details:
I PROPOSE THAT ANYONE APPLYING FOR A PROVISIONAL DRIVING LICENCE MUST HAVE PASSED A HIGHWAY-CODE-BASED THEORY TEST BEFORE THEIR PROVISIONAL  LICENCE IS GRANTED.
AT PRESENT,  PROVISIONAL LICENCE HOLDERS  ARE ALLOWED TO TAKE TO OUR ROADS WITHOUT  ANY DEGREE OF KNOWLEDGE OF THE BASIC RULES OF THE ROAD. THIS SITUATION IS  POTENTIALLY  VERY DANGEROUS, ESPECIALLY FOR THOSE WHO ARE NOT BEING TAUGHT BY A QUALIFIED DRIVING INSTRUCTOR.
THE PROPOSED NEW TEST WOULD BE IN ADDITION TO THE CURRENT THEORY TEST    AND WOULD HELP MAKE OUR ROADS SAFERER  FOR EVERYONE..
